about.title: About Us
about.heading: Welcome to Al-Fares Center
about.intro: Your dedicated specialist for computer repair and data recovery in Jeddah. We provide professional services backed by over 12 years of industry experience.

experience.title: 12 Years of Experience
experience.description: Over 12 years of expertise in computer maintenance and data recovery, serving thousands of satisfied clients.

dataRecovery.title: Data Recovery
dataRecovery.description: Professional services to retrieve lost data from hard drives and various storage devices using cutting-edge technology.

appleRepair.title: Apple Device Repair
appleRepair.description: Comprehensive maintenance for Apple devices, including iMac and MacBook, with genuine replacement parts.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Solutions
comprehensive.description: Integrated solutions for all computer and laptop issues, from maintenance and upgrades to software installation.

list.title: Professional PC-3000 Technology
list.description: Featuring the latest in data recovery with the PC-3000 Portable PRO. Advanced technology to recover data from the most challenging cases.

list.title: Specialized Clean Room
list.description: We operate in a sterile, clean room environment to open hard drives and perform sensitive data recovery procedures with the highest quality standards.

list.title: Specialized Technical Team
list.description: A team of experts specialized in computer repair and data recovery with over 12 years of experience in the field.

steps.title: Reception
steps.description: We receive your device and perform an initial inspection to identify the issue

steps.title: Diagnosis
steps.description: We conduct a comprehensive examination using the latest equipment and technologies

steps.title: Cost Estimate
steps.description: We provide you with a detailed report and clear price quote before starting

steps.title: Execution & Delivery
steps.description: After your approval, we begin work and deliver your device as quickly as possible
